es.uam.eps.ir.relison.content
Classes and definitions for user-generated contents in social networks.

Content inverted index definitions.

Definitions of objects for storing frequencies of terms in documents.

Basic classes and interfaces for simulating the information propagation.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.data.filter
Data filters, for filtering the information pieces that reach the simulation.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.expiration
Expiration mechanisms, that control how much time pieces of information can be repropagated in the network.

Classes for reading and writing the data from/to a text file/set of text files.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.io.backup
Classes for reading and writing the simulations.

Diffusion metrics for each individual information piece.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.propagation
Propagation mechanisms, for selecting the set of users which will receive the propagated information.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.protocols
Information diffusion protocols.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.selections
Selection mechanism, for selecting the pieces of information to propagate.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.sight
Sight mechanism, for selecting the information pieces which will be observed.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.simulation
Simulation engine classes and interfaces.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.diffusion.stop
Stop mechanism, for deciding when the simulation finishes.

es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.degree.sizenorm
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the degree of the communities (normalizing by community size).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.edge
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the number of edges between pairs of communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.edge.sizenorm
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the number of edges between pairs of communities (normalizing by community size).

Community detection algorithm based on the connectedness of the nodes.

Modularity-based community detection approaches.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.community.detection.modularity.balanced
Community detection algorithms attempting to balance the community size.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.community.graph
Generators for creating community reduced networks (nodes are the communities in the network and edges represent links between users in different communities).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.community.io
Classes for reading and writing community structure from files.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics
Social network analysis metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph
Social network analysis global communities graph metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree.sizenormalized  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.edges
Metrics for computing the community edge Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient for the number of edges between each pair of communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.edges.dice
Metrics for computing the Dice community edge Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient over the pairs of communities in the graph, where the frequency is the relation between the real number of edges between communities, and the number of edges between communities in a configuration network where the link degree distributions are equivalent to the ones in the studied network.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.edges.sizenormalized
Metrics for computing the size normalized community edge Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient for the number of edges in the graph, divided by the maximum number of possible links between the endpoint communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.graph.gini.size  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.communities.indiv
Social network analysis individual communities graph metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.complementary
Social network analysis metrics over the complementary graph.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.complementary.pair
Social network analysis metrics for pairs of users on the complementary graph (independently of the fact that a link exists).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.complementary.vertex
Social network vertex metrics for the complementary graph.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance
Distance-based metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.graph
Distance-based global metrics, computed for the whole graph.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.modes

es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.pair
Distance-based metrics for individual pairs of nodes in the network.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.distance.vertex
Distance-based metrics for individual nodes in the network.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.exception
Exception for social network analysis metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.graph
Social network analysis global metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.graph.aggregate
Global metrics for the entire graph which have origin on individual vertex, edge or pair metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.pair
Social network analysis metrics for pairs of users (independently of the fact that a link exists).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.vertex
